channel.title: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: A theme fer Cap'n Hugo designed fer documentat'n.

item.title: Basics
item.description: Discover what this Cap'n Hugo theme be all about an' th' core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Rambl'n
item.description: Find out how t' create an' org'nize yer rrrambl'n quickly an' intuitively.

item.title: Shorrrtcodes
item.description: Cap'n Hugo uses Marrrkdown fer its simple rrrambl'n format. However, there be a lot o' th'ns that Marrrkdown doesnâ€™t support well. Ye could use pure HTML t' expand possibilities.
